评论详情: This would have been a great overshirt and exactly what I wanted, had I not been sent something 3 sizes larger than I ordered and already used!
Definitely not oversized like the picture, it’s much shorter. Good quality though!
It's a great shacket - I wore it over a white shirt on the airplane and I was comfortable. Definitely recommend.
This sweater is comfortable, soft, and was a good valued. If you are wanting a comfy cozy and cute sweater this is the one!
It would be assumed that this is thick due to the interpretation online. The picture portrays it as thicker. It’s like a waffle knit light shirt. Extreme over size. Just looks frumpy.
This is thicker than a flannel shirt, closer to a light jacket. You can dress it up or down based on what you wear with it. I have gotten many compliments on it and will recommend it to others.
Washed according to tag instructions before wear and was discolored out of the wash. Never got to wear.

I’m really into waffle tops but this is NOT IT. On top of the fact that the “apricot” color looks more like an old stained and sun bleached dingy color, it IS NOT the fabric that it’s portrayed to be in the pictures. YIKES!  I opened my black Friday haul in front of my best friend and both of us just CRINGED! She even laughed like WHAT WERE YOU THINKING!? I had to go back to the order like “what WAS I thinking…?” I was thinking it was going to look remotely similar to the photos … much mistaken! Yikes
Not a bad shirt, just not what was pictured & I don't like it. Collar & seam down the middle (along the buttons) is a different fabric. Returning.
So cute. Runs true to size. So comfy and the material is thick enough to keep me warm.
This is one of my favorite button up shirts ever. Lightweight yet warm, the color is phenomenal too!
Runs small. Not heavy at all. Truly just another shirt
Very true to size and love the color.
Maybe runs a bit large, but i LOVE it. Great quality! i can wear this to work, out to dinner or to the pumpkin patch. versatile!
Goes great with any outfit. Light weight but keeps you warm . If you are thinking about buying it just do it. You won't regret it.
Has a nice fit and is true to size. Material is nice, good quality. I would recommend this
Light weight and good quality. It's perfect for fall. Oversized fit.
I'm really happy with the purchase! Not heavy but just what I wanted! Received a lot of compliments!! Would buy again in another color!
This was a great investment. It’s cute, cozy and comfortable.
Love this jacket, true to size and great quality.

This is my new favorite shirt! Heading to a football game tonight and this is the perfect addition to my fall wardrobe! I ordered a small and it is a great comfy fit! The waffle material adds great texture and I love the big buttons. I cuffed the sleeves and popped the collar for that extra preppy look. I can't wait to wear this tonight! Great quality at a great price! (color- Apricot)

评论用户: My husband loved the watch.  It looks way more expensive than what I paid for it!  Its very manly looking.
评论详情: This is a nicer heavy material. I wear it all the time, especially over T-shirts or a tank top.
Love this, do wish it was longer though it's not as long as the pictures show.  It is very cute though
Great shacket and value !
Ordered off white/cream and it is as more light yellow.  Otherwise material and size was nice.
Loose fit, color more beige than I would have expected,
I really wanted to love this effortless, oversized jacket for fall, but it looked like I had stolen my uncle's clothes. Was not flattering or feminine for me.

I was a little skeptical about this one. Waffle knit just doesn't hold up. BUT, I have washed this several times and it's still just like the day it arrived! This is definitely a great piece. Hits right around the hip area. Lightweight enough to layer but still thick enough to provide warmth. Color is more solid than pictured but still very nice. The sizing seems true to size. The only complaint I have is the cuffs are a little wide and just falls past my wrist.
Great coverup for the office if you live in the south!
I love this shacket. I love adding it to outfits or just to wear around the house. It makes me happy 😃
Ordered a medium. Wish I had ordered a large. It wasn’t as oversized as I hoped. The material was soft. I would order again but a bigger size
Color is true to picture. Soft material. Washes well. Comfortable to wear.
I get great compliments every time I wear this!  Great weight and great for cool days.
I love this so much! It’s super comfy and can be worn buttoned or unbuttoned. Great for layering or just wearing on its own! I have bought it as gifts for people too and they love it as well!
Sized up and I love it. Perfect oversized/comfy button down.
Pretty thin. Not what I was hoping for. Found a thicker one cheaper at Walmart!

I understand why other reviewers mention a Free People vibe to describe this shacket.  It has three distinct fabrics: the waffle weave, stretchy slightly sheer panels down both sides, and a smooth material around the collar and cuffs and down the placket.  The apricot color is a rich cream.  I didn't love the buttons and replaced them, reversing the ones on the cuffs so I could fold the cuffs back and still button them.  Another reviewer mentioned carefully removing the pockets.  I've taken one off and am considering whether to remove the second one for a slightly less rugged look.  I like this shacket so much I also got a black one, which came with slightly nicer buttons and which I don't intend to modify.  And honestly, now I have my eye on a possible third one.  This waffle weight is perfect for cooler winter days in Florida.  I'm 5'4', 135 lbs, like my clothes roomy and am happy with size L.  I haven't washed either shacket yet: I always use a washbag, cold water, and hang garments like this to dry, so I'm hoping shrinkage will be minimal.  If not, I will revise my review.
clothing was flattering and stylish.

Love this shacket! Looks and feels like the Free People/Aerie ones. I will say it runs small. I ordered a medium and I think I’ll order another in large to wear with leggings. For reference I am 5’1 pant size 2/4 and usually wear size small.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: Great top for layering and with the collar is perfect for zoom calls. Quality and color is good. It is oversized and I got large, could go to a medium.
I like the color and quality
Well made loose fitted shirt. Very casual compy

评论概述: I love the weight of this top
评论详情: My daughter has one and It looks great on her. I'm 76 and I wanted to get one for myself. Very happy with it.
This top runs a little big, but not much, if yo decide to dry after washing. I always get compliments on the top. Very comfortable. Can be dressed up or down.
This color paid perfect with my birkenstock boston clogs!  Its vedy comfy and I got a lot of compliments.

This shirt feels and looks amazing. It’s a little oversized and I love it. I bought 2 more colors. The material is really soft too. I wear them over a thin t shirt or camisole and it looks great.

Cute and comfy

Didn’t love the front pocket and looking for more thickness so i returned

评论概述: Nice shacket but more yellow than pictured
评论详情: I wanted to really love this, but it was definitely more yellow than pictured. It was not as soft as I was imagining either other than that the style was as described.

评论概述: It’s not the same a pictures
评论详情: Pretty disappointed. I should have returned immediately when what I ordered did not match the website description but I thought I’d give it a chance. Wish I didn’t because now instead of being able to return because I’ve worn a few times, it’s in the good will bag. Besides it not looking like it did online, the sizing was way off and after washing it’s shrunk and just looks stupid on me. Save your money, there are better options out there.
I love this shirt . Washes well and great fit.
Very similar to Free People. I wear mine almost 1-2x a week
I love this shirt so easy to pair with jeans,  very comfortable o love it,  I bought several colors
Ordered the off white one. I'm 5'7" and it ran awkwardly short on my. Better for petite build. The fabric has a different feel as well. 3 stars as it looks decent on the hanger
I really like my sweater but unless you like them bigger than normal  order a size smaller
This is great for an extra layer on a cool fall night. Every time I wear it people compliment it.
Looks like the photo
Hated it. It was giant and cheap looking.
Wear a tshirt under it or whatever you choose. It’s soft, loose fit and comfy! Goes with anything! I purchased gray and navy blue nice colors.
When you return this this item, they won’t refund you for 30 days which is ridiculous, so I will never order this brand or from this company ever again

评论概述: Stylish Shacket for a Great Price
评论详情: This jacket is a great addition to my fall wardrobe.  It pairs well with anything from a casual dress to leggings.  It’s great quality for the price.  Fit is true to size.
I wear this on a weekly basis. It goes with any outfit. Super comfy. Light weight. But not super thin.
Item doesn't fit properly and is poor quality. I would return but window has closed.
This lightweight sweater is so soft & comfy! It’s such a great versatile fall piece. It’s definitely loose, but that’s kind of the style. So I would still say true to size
Perfect for fall. Light weight and love versatility

I can’t say anything negative about this shacket. It’s so soft and comfy. The color is a perfect taupe/mocha with neutral undertones that work with many colors. It has a relaxed, slightly distressed look and fit without looking shabby or sloppy. PERFECT fall staple to have in your closet this season!!
Cute, comfy and fits!!

This has to be one of my new favorite shackets to wear. The brown is such a flattering color and is very trendy right now. I can wear this shacket with literally anything and it looks cute. It's an easy and fun piece to spice up any outfit. The material is soft, not itchy, and soooo comfortable. I'm 6'1 and 175lbs and I got this in a large.
This shell is cute and comfortable. I wore it traveling and was able to stay cool as it is lightweight. It folds well and can be paired easily with many  outfits.
I always bring during the camping months to throw on and wear around the fire.  Nicely made and has a softer material! Fits well

This jacket is really cute. The quality is nice and it is thick. It is definitely over sized, as advertised. If you like that look, then I would order your size. If you don't, then I would order a size down.

This button up is pretty nice. It’s definitely oversized. I normally get a medium in everything like this and it fits like a large but I don’t mind because it’s supposed to be oversized. The only thing I don’t like is the material used for the edges. It’s like a nylon or something type material and it’s not the best looking. Overall it’s a cute shirt.

The waffle knit fabric is soft and comfortable, making it perfect for chilly days. The oversized fit gives a relaxed and cozy feel. I love the button-down design, which adds a touch of sophistication to the overall look. The shirt is versatile and can be dressed up or down. The only thing to keep in mind is that the jacket true to size, so it's recommended to size up for the cozy oversized look.
Omg this is definitely one of my new fav pieces! The fit is so perfect, the color amazing, theeee material!! Chefs kiss, this one ate!

评论概述: The shirt I received looks different than the pictures online
评论详情: I liked the look of this shirt when I saw it online, but not as much in person. I ordered the off-white color (apricot) and it wasn't as thick as I thought it would be. I also didn't care for the fabric around the pockets, collar and buttons. In the pictures, it looks like soft, flannel-like fabric, but in reality, it is stiffer and looks like it stands out on the shirt. I just didn't feel like the shirt in the photos was the same as the one I received.

I usually wear a large but sized down to medium and it’s still a bit big, but it fits  exactly as I wanted. I’m 5’3” and 158 lbs.I’m going to order a second in coffee.ADD: I just received the coffee in medium and it seems even bigger than the pink one.  The instructions say hand wash and line dry.  I washed the  pink one in cool water on normal cycle and hung it to dry.  It did shrink a bit, not too much.  It's still big on me, but as I said, I like it that way.  I will do the same with the coffee.I really like these shackets. I wear them in the house if the heat is off and it's cool, rather than turn on the heat.  I wear it out as a jacket.  I really like both of them.
This oversized button down is perfection! I love wearing it with jeans or leggings!

Fit is generous enough to layer over a top or under a winter coat but it’s not too bulky. I’m 5’1” and ordered an extra large. fits great. the navy is a true, dark navy blue. The fabric is nicely woven, not thin at all. The length comes down about 3 inches above my hips. I probably will hand wash it and hang dry. overall, this is a good product and worth the money. I ordered another one in black.

I am a big fan of this style. It is the perfect layering piece and works as a trendy alternative to the sweater that I usually bring with me to work. It is substantial enough to provide warmth, without leaving me sweaty at the end of the day. It is beautifully constructed and looks expensive. Another big plus is that it does not require an iron after washing. My only dislike was the pockets on the front. They were a bit oversized for my taste, and I did not care for the large buttons. I chose to remove them (very carefully, with the assistance of a seam ripper, in good lighting). Having removed the pockets, I am thrilled with this shacket. I am certain I will wear it often.

This is a really nice light jacket for the beginning of fall or if you are looking for something to layer. The reason why I rated 4 stars is because the material is much thinner than I expected. But other than that, the fabric is soft and its definitely oversized as advertised.
I am in LOVE with this shacket. It fits perfectly, but has some stretch to it, so it is not stuffy. I also love how soft it is. A fall must have this season!
This is such a great piece! It is very soft and comfortable! It fit as expected and washes well. It goes awesome with leggings! Makes for a great casual outfit. Would recommend.

I have seen this jacket in Free People and at Anthropologie and the price was insane. I ordered this one and you will not be disappointed. It’s so cute it’s very light. You can take it from day tonight. Put it over jeans or over a dress I love it so much you can also wear it standalone as a top. It’s perfect for California evenings.

This is the kind of shirt I could have in every color! The material and waffle weave pattern is so comfortable and soft.  I ordered in the Apricot color and it is more of a creamy beige...nice neutral color.  Looking forward to wearing this when the weather finally changes!
I ordered a large but will be exchanging for a medium

This is a cozy shacket. It is very trendy as well. The waffle knit fabric is defined. It is definitely an oversized fit. I could have gone with a small. The fit is good except the sleeves are super long on me. I think this jacket will be warm for fall weather.

Fits as expected.  It said it is a flannel shaket.  Actually it is a woven thermal type material.  It’s super cute.  Sleeves were extra long but i just cuffed and put button on opposite side of sleeve.  A nice contrast. Button missing on a pocket tho!

I really like the weight of this thermal weave shirt. It is perfect for these early fall mornings when I take the pup outside. The only problem I have is the button/buttonhole size. The buttonhole is just too tight for the large buttons, so fastening them is difficult. The shirt comes with an extra button. It washed and dried well on delicate.

With a T underneath, this is the perfect outfit for these cool fall days.  I love the big buttons - such a relief from all those zippers and they really give this shacket style.  The sleeves are a bit long, but can be shoved up.  The color is neutral and can be worn with so many others.  Nice weight, too.  I enjoy wearing it!

This "shaket" (a new word for me which is obviously a portmanteau of shirt and jacket) came true to the color chosen, and true to the size.  According to my wife:  It's very comfortable, and as the weather starts heading into fall, it's a nice, light addition to my wardrobe.  I thought it would be a bit thicker given the description.  It's definitely more a shirt than a jacket.  But that's not necessarily a criticism, just an observation.  Washing it didn't seem to shrink it, at least in a noticeable way.  It's versatile because you can wear it around the house when you have a little chill, plus you can wear it out to lunch or dinner because it blends with all my casual clothing.
This jacket is so cute! It's light weight and can be layered easily. It feels great and handles the wash well. I'm so happy I got this! It will definitely be a staple this Fall & Winter.

Got a medium and was pretty oversized when I first tried it on to the point where I had to cuff the sleeves up. Washed before wearing and it shrunk A LOT!!  The sleeves are normal length now.  Please consider this when choosing the size.
The length was nowhere near as shown.  Material is very cheap. Sending this back.
